questions.text: Episode: "Noxious Avenger": What color was the mutagen that was spilled on the garbage man?
questions.explanation:
Green.

	The first mutagen shown in the episode was purple, but the mutagen that was knocked out the window and spilled on the garbage man was green. The purple mutagen had the ability to de-mutate an animal, the green is what caused mutations in the first place. The garbage man turned into a giant mutated pile of trash.

questions.text: Episode: "Noxious Avenger": When they first met, what did Muckman do to the Turtles?
options: He befriended them by trying to hug Mikey.
He tried to talk to them.
questions.explanation:
He attacked them.

	Muckman was upset because he saw the Turtles go into the building that the mutagen was thrown out of. After the Turtles were able to talk with him, he decided they weren't all bad and they all became friends.

questions.text: Episode: "Clash of the Mutanimals": What project was Donnie working on when he was disturbed?
questions.explanation:
The Shellraiser.

	Donnie was in his lab when he heard a loud crash. He went into the main room of the lair expecting to see Raph causing the issue, but instead he saw Leatherhead who had crashed into the room. Leatherhead told him and the others about the kidnapping of Slash and Doctor Rockwell that had happened in the previous scene.

questions.text: Episode: "Clash of the Mutanimals": Which Turtle fell under Baxter Stockman's mind control?
questions.explanation:
Raph.

	Slash and Dr. Rockwell of the Mighty Mutanimals were also under the control of the serum. The serum was administered by feeding it to worms and then letting the worms crawl into the ear canal of the mutants. Using a particular type of noise caused the worms to wiggle out of their ears and saved them from the mind control serum.

questions.text: Episode: "Meet Mondo Gecko": What hobby did Mondo Gecko have?
questions.explanation:
Skateboarding.

	Even before he mutated, Jason (Mondo Gecko) was a big skateboarder. Mikey and Casey met him while all three were skating. He had become a gecko because he had a pet gecko that was with him when the mutagen was spilled on him.

questions.text: Episode: "Meet Mondo Gecko": Which criminal did Mondo Gecko work for?
questions.explanation:
Fish Face.

	He tricked Mikey into coming down to his own sewer lair to meet Mr. X. Mickey then found out that Mr. X was Xever Montes, which was Fishface's human name before he mutated.

questions.text: Episode: "The Deadly Venom": Who did Baxter Stockman use his mind control worms on in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Karai.

	Karai, in her human form, had one of the worms implanted in her ear in the opening scene. She then listened to every word the Shredder said. She attacked Rocksteady and then was sent after the Turtles.

questions.text: Episode: "The Deadly Venom": What type of animal poisoned most of the main characters?
questions.explanation:
Snakes.

	Karai in her mutant form is a giant serpent. She used the snakes to poison Casey, April and all of the Turtles during the episode. After Leo drew enough strength to defeat her, she escaped while he saved the others.

questions.text: Episode: "Turtles in Time": Which Turtle swore he'd never fall in love at the start of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Mikey.

	Of course that proclamation turned false just moments later. Mikey fell in love with the time traveller from the future named Renet. Mikey had been making fun of Leo for having feelings for Karai and Donnie for his feelings for April.

questions.text: Episode: "Turtles in Time": Was the scepter that was stolen from Lord Simultaneous a magic item?
questions.explanation:
No.

	It was from the far off future and was simply advanced technology, not magic. The scepter allowed Renet to travel through time.
